hierarchy.chapter: Chapter VIII — Remedies, Liability and Penalties

content.verbatim_text: Each supervisory authority shall ensure that the imposition of administrative fines shall in each individual case be effective, proportionate and dissuasive. Fines up to EUR 20,000,000 or 4% of annual worldwide turnover, whichever is higher, for infringements of the basic principles for processing, data subjects' rights, and transfers to third countries.
content.title: General conditions for imposing administrative fines

structured_data.chapter: Chapter VIII — Remedies, Liability and Penalties
structured_data.relevance_to_odgs: Penalty framework — quantifies the financial risk that ODGS governance is designed to mitigate

interpretation.summary: GDPR Art. 83: General conditions for imposing administrative fines
interpretation.applicability: All organizations processing personal data of EU residents
